results.title: Glimpses of enchanting Japan
results.brief_description: A colourful variety of aspects of the land and nature of Japan. Beginning with the new year the film introduces the Grand Shrines of Ise, most honoured of the national shrines; the charming doll festival; the dramatic “water drawing’ rites of Nara are illuminated by torch light; the Mibu pantomime of Kyoto and the Dontaku festival of Hakata. Interspersed are shots of ancient temples and shrines contrasting with ultra-modern structures based on traditional architecture.

results.title: Glimpses of China
results.brief_description: Gives glimpses of life in China and takes a more detailed look at four major cities- Xian, Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou (Canton). Each place shows a part of China as it is today- infinitely varied rapidly changing and a fascinating land of contrasts.
results.description: Gives glimpses of life in China and takes a more detailed look at four major cities- Xian, Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou (Canton). Each place shows a part of China as it is today- infinitely varied rapidly changing and a fascinating land of contrasts.

results.title: Glaucoma: Sneak thief of sight
results.brief_description: Discusses the causes, diagnosis, and control of glaucoma, stressing the urgency of early detection of the disease in order to prevent blindness. Depicts various forms of the disease and includes artwork sequences to explain the anatomy of the eye.
results.description: Discusses the causes, diagnosis, and control of glaucoma, stressing the urgency of early detection of the disease in order to prevent blindness. Depicts various forms of the disease and includes artwork sequences to explain the anatomy of the eye.

results.title: Glasshouse soils
results.creator_credit: Mary Beales, Jack Chambers and Central Office of Inofrmation Film
results.brief_description: Shows the need for regular sterilisation of glasshouse soils if plant diseases are to be avoided. The methods used at the Cheshunt Experimental and Research Station, England, are described.

results.title: Given a chance
results.brief_description: This is a video which focusses on the life experiences of refugee young people in australia. The video is divided into two sections: Section one explores the refugee experience from the perspective of 5 young who have resettled in Australia from the countries of El Salvador, Vietnam, Afghanistan, Cambodia and Eritrea. It is relevant to both workers and young people. Section two explores issues for service providers and contains interviews with experienced workers with refugee young people. The video can be used in education and training of both young people and professionals working with refugee young people. Includes video training notes.

results.title: Give us a go
results.creator_credit: Diane Charleson and Materials Production, Education Dept for Equal Opportunity Board
results.brief_description: An explanation of the functions of the Equal Opportunity Board as it relates to the disabled. Various examples of discrimination are shown together with re-enactments showing conciliation and Board hearings.
